title: Online Education Sentiment Analysis Application: Short-Term Science Expertise Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning literacy and foundational understanding of scientific inquiry methods
context.additional_context: Real-time science education optimization for high school students preparing for careers in medical/legal/technical fields, accessible exclusively via smartphones without PCs.

learning_goals: Learners can classify positive/negative emotions in peer feedback from online science classes with 80% accuracy using sentiment analysis tools.
Learners can write three practical suggestions to improve instructors' explanation methods in online science classes based on sentiment analysis results.
Learners can demonstrate a procedure for real-time collection of text feedback from class satisfaction surveys using smartphone applications in limited-device environments.

resources: Online Lab Simulation Tools for Science Subjects
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
